welcome.title: Welcome to Page Builder
welcome.description: Start creating your first page layout

componentPanel.title: Component Library
componentPanel.description: Drag components to the canvas to use them

descriptions.heroSimple: A simple hero section with title, subtitle and actions
descriptions.heroCentered: A centered hero with badge, title and buttons
descriptions.headerBasic: A basic site header with navigation
descriptions.footerBasic: A basic footer with links and info
descriptions.featuresGrid: Showcase features in a grid layout
descriptions.featuresList: Showcase features in a list layout
descriptions.socialProofAvatars: Display user avatars as social proof
descriptions.ctaSimple: Simple call-to-action with title, description and button
descriptions.ctaSplit: Two-column call-to-action with features and actions
descriptions.pricingCards: Pricing cards with monthly/yearly toggle and feature comparison
descriptions.faqAccordion: Accordion-based FAQ with categories and search
descriptions.siteControlPillDock: A floating pill dock (top-right/bottom-right) combining language and theme switchers
descriptions.siteControlGearPopover: A gear button that opens a settings card with language and theme controls
descriptions.siteControlInlineBar: An inline bar suitable for header or content areas

componentPanel.testComponentDescription: This is a test component to verify scrolling functionality
componentPanel.categoryTestDescription: This is a test component under the {{category}} category

propertyPanel.title: Properties
propertyPanel.noSelection: Select a component to edit properties

empty.title: Start building your page
empty.description: Drag components from the left panel here
empty.hint: Tip: You can drag components to reorder them

canvas.dropDescription: Place components here to start building your page

preview.title: Preview Page
preview.backToBuilder: Please go back to the page builder and click the preview button
preview.generatedBy: This page was generated by the page builder

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.generatorSubtitle: Convert your drag-and-drop page into a fully localized, multi-language page

stats.componentCountDesc: Total number of components on the page

smartUpdateHome.title: Smartly Update Homepage
smartUpdateHome.description: Automatically back up the original file, intelligently update translations, and keep your custom content intact

generateStandalone.title: Generate Standalone Page
generateStandalone.description: Generate a standalone internationalized page without affecting the current homepage

features.title: Features
features.bidirectional: Support bidirectional translation between Chinese and English

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1: Add and configure components on the canvas
instructions.step2: Translations update automatically when editing component properties
instructions.step3: Choose a generation method and click the generate button
instructions.step4: System will handle translations and file updates automatically

notes.title: Notes
notes.itemBackup: Smart update will back up original files to the backups/ directory
notes.itemSave: Translations are saved under the messages/ directory for relevant components
notes.itemPreview: Preview translations first and confirm before updating the homepage
notes.itemRestart: Restart the dev server after generation to see the latest changes

messages.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to leave?
messages.noComponentsPreview: Please add some components first before previewing
messages.noComponentsToSave: Please add some components first before saving
messages.noComponentsToExport: Please add some components first before exporting code
messages.codeExported: Code exported! The file contains components and properties identical to those in the page builder.
messages.noComponentsToTranslate: Please add some components first before translating
messages.confirmTranslate:
Are you sure you want to translate the current page to {{targetLang}}?

This will call the translation API, please ensure the translation service is configured.
messages.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the canvas? This action cannot be undone.
messages.noComponentsToApply: Please add some components first before applying to project
messages.confirmApplyToProject: Are you sure you want to apply the current built page to the project homepage?\n\nThis will replace the project's current homepage layout.
messages.applyToProjectSuccess: Page has been successfully applied to project homepage!\n\nYou can visit the project homepage to see the changes.
messages.applyToProjectFailed: Failed to apply to project homepage: {{error}}
messages.openProjectHome: Would you like to open the project homepage now to see the results?

fixedPosition.cannotMove: This component has a fixed position and cannot be moved
fixedPosition.cannotDrag: This component has a fixed position and cannot be dragged after adding
fixedPosition.cannotMoveWarning: Fixed position components cannot be moved
